description: This dashboard compares average daily utilization measurements for virtual machines week-over-week for two consecutive weeks. All VMs in the selected group are included in the averages.

panels.description: Average Virtual Memory utilization for VM's

targets.rawSql:
WITH data as (
   SELECT m.time
          ,avg(m.utilization) AS avg_util
      FROM entity e
      JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid
       AND m.entity_hash = e.hash
       AND m.type = 'VMEM'
       AND e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
       AND m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') AND date_trunc('day', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)
       AND ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen)
       AND CASE WHEN ARRAY[ $Group ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ $Group ]::bigint[]) END
     GROUP BY 1
)

 SELECT CASE 
            WHEN time BETWEEN date_trunc('day', $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') AND date_trunc('day', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') THEN date_trunc('day', time + interval '7 day') 
            ELSE date_trunc('day', time) 
       END + interval '1 DAY' as "time"
      ,
       CASE 
            WHEN time BETWEEN date_trunc('day', $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') AND date_trunc('day', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') THEN 'Previous Week'
            ELSE 'Week Ending ' || DATE($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)::TEXT
       END as metric
      ,avg(avg_util)
  FROM data
 GROUP BY 1, 2

panels.title: VM Avg VMem Utilization

panels.description: Average Virtual CPU utilization for VM's

targets.rawSql:
WITH data as (
   SELECT m.time
          ,avg(m.utilization) AS avg_util
      FROM entity e
      JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid
       AND m.entity_hash = e.hash
       AND m.type = 'VCPU'
       AND e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
       AND m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') AND date_trunc('day', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)
       AND ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day',$__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen)
       AND CASE WHEN ARRAY[ $Group ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ $Group ]::bigint[]) END
     GROUP BY 1
)

 SELECT CASE 
            WHEN time BETWEEN date_trunc('day', $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') AND date_trunc('day', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') THEN date_trunc('day', time + interval '7 day') 
            ELSE date_trunc('day', time) 
       END + interval '1 DAY' as "time"
      ,
       CASE 
            WHEN time BETWEEN date_trunc('day', $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') AND date_trunc('day', $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') THEN 'Previous Week'
            ELSE 'Week Ending ' || DATE($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)::TEXT
       END as metric
      ,avg(avg_util)
  FROM data
 GROUP BY 1, 2

panels.title: VM Avg VCPU Utilization

list.definition:
SELECT name as __text,
       oid as __value 
FROM entity 
WHERE entity.type = 'GROUP' 
AND ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
AND attrs -> 'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
GROUP BY name, oid 
ORDER BY 1
list.name: Group
list.query:
SELECT name as __text,
       oid as __value 
FROM entity 
WHERE entity.type = 'GROUP' 
AND ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
AND attrs -> 'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
GROUP BY name, oid 
ORDER BY 1

title: Virtual Machine Utilization Week over Week By Day
